thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 19 of 3062
thread.title: Anthony Moore

author: Anthony Moore
title: Anthony Moore
text:
The web site booking is excellent as is the automatic conversion to our local currency (A$).
My only complaint is the extraordinary difference in hire costs between manual and automatic cars. Most of the world has grown out of manual gearboxes as automatic gearboxes are safer and more reliable than manual especially in an unfamiliar road system.. Given the take up of automatic cars I doubt if the cost of an automatic is any more than a manual if purchased in bulk by a hire company..
